duties_responsibilities.duty: Training and supervising Members in day-to-day program services
Developing and implementing curriculum aligned with the Person-Centered Service model
Conducting home visits to assure Members' needs are met
Assisting with interviewing, training, and evaluating volunteers
Communicating and advocating with other agencies to assure Members' needs are met
Documenting and compiling Members' statistics and program goals
Assisting with strategic planning, evaluation, and workforce and program planning
Assisting with maintaining clean and safe work environment
Attending and participating in meetings and trainings

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science Degree in Social Services or related field and 1-year paid experience working with people with Developmental Disabilities/Intellectual Disabilities OR High School diploma with 4 years paid work experience working with people with Developmental Disabilities/Intellectual Disabilities
